text: Ini: "anwa ay d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Öebbi. Ihi day a pperrem d iêbiben, war Neppa, wid ur nemlik, i yiman nnsen, aba$uô ne$ vveôô"? Ini: "day iaâdel uder$al akked win ipwalin? Ne$, day âadlent tillas akked tafat? Ne$, rran imcurak i Öebbi, i ixelqen am lxelq iS, ufan t ippemcabi"? Ini: "d Öebbi i Ixelqen yal cci. D Neppa ay d Yiwen, d Aqehhaô
